The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 07 May is 42,013 (4,862.7 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 02 May, there were 114 new confirmed cases (13.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 25 April, there were 130 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 12% (16 fewer cases).
